sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Stack,Container, Form , FormControl , FormLabel, Button}from'react-bootstrap'
import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form'
import * as Yup from 'yup'
import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup';
import './Login.css'
const Login = () => {


        const formSchema= Yup.object().shape({
        email : Yup.string().max(20).required().email(),
        password : Yup.string().max(12).required(),
        rePassword : Yup.string().max(12).required("Comfirm Password is required")
                        .oneOf([ Yup.ref("password")] ,"Please Enter the same password")
    })
    const  {register, handleSubmit ,formState:{errors} } = useForm({resolver: yupResolver(formSchema) });

    const submit =(data:object)=>{console.log(data)}
  return (
    <Container className='Login Form'>
        <Form>
            <legend>User Login</legend>
            <Form.Group>
                <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
                <Form.Control
                    type='text'
                    {...register("email")}
                />
                <Form.Text>{errors.email?.message}</Form.Text>
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group>
                <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
                <Form.Control
                    type='password'
                    {...register("password")}
                />
                <Form.Text>{errors.password?.message}</Form.Text>
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group>
                <FormLabel>Comfirm Password</FormLabel>
                <Form.Control
                    type='password'
                    {...register("rePassword")}
                />
                <Form.Text>{errors.rePassword?.message}</Form.Text>
            </Form.Group>
        </Form>
            <Button className='btnSubmit' onClick={handleSubmit(submit)}>Submit</Button>
    </Container>
  )
}


export default Login
